alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Shelby; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 6:55AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tuscaloosa, southwestern Shelby and northern Bibb Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 655 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Coaling, or 13 miles northwest of Brent, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake View, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, Lake Wildwood, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, Eoline, North Bibb, Abernant, Bucksville, Marvel, Hagler, Green Pond, Pearson, Caffee Junction, Hebron and Harmon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
